money will be spent or blood will be spilled warned mrs gannet as she packed me off for a trip to jfk. thus it was that after a mornings birding in central park i found myself at the door of tiffany and co. on 5th ave. unshaven wearing my army surplus outfit and a panicky expression at the thought of how much cash would need to be spent to avoid bloodshed i entered through the revolving doors monopod in hand. if i have any criticism of 5th avenues most prestigious jeweller it is their lack of provision for parking a bicycle outside their store.

up until then the day had been going very well that is birds had been seen and very little money had been spent. central parks barred owl was still in situ though tricky to find in the arboretum. one dropped to the ground in the oven at the top end of the boating lake and was faced down by a very ballsy gray squirrel.

money will be spent or blood will be spilled warned mrs gannet as she packed me off for a trip to jfk. thus it was that after a mornings birding in central park i found myself at the door of tiffany and co. on 5th ave. unshaven wearing my army surplus outfit and a panicky expression at the thought of how much cash would need to be spent to avoid bloodshed i entered through the revolving doors monopod in hand. a security risk profiling expert may have suggested that my appearance would fit nicely into the pigeonhole reserved for desperate wild eyed cosh wielding vagrant.

up until then the day had been going very well that is birds had been seen and very little money had been spent. central parks barred owl was still in situ though tricky to find in the arboretum. the red tailed hawks were very visible and a hairy woodpecker showed very well in the ramble.

money will be spent or blood will be spilled warned mrs gannet as she packed me off for a trip to jfk. a security risk profiling expert may have suggested that my appearance would fit nicely into the pigeonhole reserved for desperate wild eyed cosh wielding vagrant. i have no issues with the security personnel at tiffanys who acted in accordance with their training and were very apologetic as they picked me up and dusted me down.

central parks barred owl was still in situ though tricky to find in the arboretum. i had headed straight for the ramble where two juvenile red tailed hawks were following each other through the trees. one dropped to the ground in the oven at the top end of the boating lake and was faced down by a very ballsy gray squirrel.

the young hawk had found a detached wing and picked at the feather bases before flying up onto a higher branch to scan the ground below. the willow was rooted beside the waters edge and the high rocks that i was standing on put us at the same level.

the young hawk had found a detached wing and picked at the feather bases before flying up onto a higher branch to scan the ground below. the willow was rooted beside the waters edge and the high rocks that i was standing on put us at the same level.

the young hawk had found a detached wing and picked at the feather bases before flying up onto a higher branch to scan the ground below. the willow was rooted beside the waters edge and the high rocks that i was standing on put us at the same level.

the feeder area was very busy with white throated sparrows and northern cardinals taking loose feed that had been scattered on a rock. the black seed socks were being dominated by american goldfinches while tufted titmice and house finches fed from the silo sized feeders.

the feeder area was very busy with white throated sparrows and northern cardinals taking loose feed that had been scattered on a rock. the black seed socks were being dominated by american goldfinches while tufted titmice and house finches fed from the silo sized feeders.

the feeder area was very busy with white throated sparrows and northern cardinals taking loose feed that had been scattered on a rock. the black seed socks were being dominated by american goldfinches while tufted titmice and house finches fed from the silo sized feeders.

my first visit to the arboretum failed to find the barred owl. it had started to snow and the wind was picking up so i didnt work too hard but on my way back i bumped into a couple of birders who told me where to look and i managed to find it at the second pass. by the time i passed back through the ramble the paths were coated with a thin layer of snow and looked very picturesque.

my first visit to the arboretum failed to find the barred owl. it had started to snow and the wind was picking up so i didnt work too hard but on my way back i bumped into a couple of birders who told me where to look and i managed to find it at the second pass. by the time i passed back through the ramble the paths were coated with a thin layer of snow and looked very picturesque.

my first visit to the arboretum failed to find the barred owl. it had started to snow and the wind was picking up so i didnt work too hard but on my way back i bumped into a couple of birders who told me where to look and i managed to find it at the second pass. by the time i passed back through the ramble the paths were coated with a thin layer of snow and looked very picturesque.

a sweep to my ears but sibley prefers peek from a dead tree caught my attention and i turned to find a hairy woodpecker looking straight at me. it dropped to a damp stump close to the ground and gave me my best ever look at this species. perhaps it was slightly stained by wood pulp?

a sweep to my ears but sibley prefers peek from a dead tree caught my attention and i turned to find a hairy woodpecker looking straight at me. it dropped to a damp stump close to the ground and gave me my best ever look at this species. the inconspicuous tuft sibley at the base of the bill was very apparent at close quarters.

a sweep to my ears but sibley prefers peek from a dead tree caught my attention and i turned to find a hairy woodpecker looking straight at me. it dropped to a damp stump close to the ground and gave me my best ever look at this species. the inconspicuous tuft sibley at the base of the bill was very apparent at close quarters.

northern cardinals had been showing quite well today and i have long held an ambition to catch a picture of one in the snow. i was hoping that today might be the day but the snow didnt stay for long. one did drop down for a drink while carrying a few snow flakes and kept me happy until my next opportunity.

northern cardinals had been showing quite well today and i have long held an ambition to catch a picture of one in the snow. i was hoping that today might be the day but the snow didnt stay for long. one did drop down for a drink while carrying a few snow flakes and kept me happy until my next opportunity.

saturday the 9th of june at 14 30 we crossed our great loop wake. it has only taken us 11 years 37 days and 4 and half hours. it has been a fantastic ride so far and are looking forward to the next adventures!
beautiful morning leaving barnegat anchorage saturday morning

saturday the 9th of june at 14 30 we crossed our great loop wake. six thousand engine hours and 40 000 estimated miles. in may of 2001 our beloved broulee was off loaded at elizabeth seaport new jersey.
beautiful morning leaving barnegat anchorage saturday morning

after a 30 day trip from hong kong aboard a container ship we were there to meet her and start our incredible journey of the last 11 years. ours was previously owned by an australian a pilot for cathay pacific and spent her first couple of years moored at discovery bay in hong kong. we flew to the philippines in january of 2001 for an inspection survey and sea trial it was a no brainer we fell in love with her immediately.
beautiful morning leaving barnegat anchorage saturday morning

our destination of this leg of the trip is half moon bay croton on the hudson. rick's sister sandra lives 20 minutes away so we will spend time with family clean up the boat pack our bags and on thursday head to minnesota for a grandkid fix water skiing and weeding of the gardens.

entering the marina at half moon bay croton on the hudson. on a side note marina fees in this part of the country are astronomical and evidently they don't discount for a monthly rate. stay tuned!
crossing our wake finally! saturday the 9th of june at 14 30 we crossed our great loop wake. it has been a fantastic ride so far and are looking forward to the next adventures!

entering the marina at half moon bay croton on the hudson. on a side note marina fees in this part of the country are astronomical and evidently they don't discount for a monthly rate. our first call to half moon bay they quoted us 3 600 for a month.
crossing our wake finally! saturday the 9th of june at 14 30 we crossed our great loop wake. it has only taken us 11 years 37 days and 4 and half hours.

on a side note marina fees in this part of the country are astronomical and evidently they don't discount for a monthly rate. seems we are here at peak season and found a place on long island sound in ct that only wanted 7 000 haverstraw marina across the river from half moon bay had a deal at 1 200 still way more than what we wanted to pay but after 7 000 it was starting to sound good. sticker shock remember we have not been in this area for 11 years and back then we were still working makes a difference.

after a 30 day trip from hong kong aboard a container ship we were there to meet her and start our incredible journey of the last 11 years. ours was previously owned by an australian a pilot for cathay pacific and spent her first couple of years moored at discovery bay in hong kong. we flew to the philippines in january of 2001 for an inspection survey and sea trial it was a no brainer we fell in love with her immediately.

last week i visited the museum of modern art in nyc. moma has a fabulous collection of all kinds of art beginning in the impressionist period and continuing to the present day. here's a shot of andrew wyeth's famous painting christina's world.

last week i visited the museum of modern art in nyc. moma has a fabulous collection of all kinds of art beginning in the impressionist period and continuing to the present day. you start at the fifth floor and work your way down through the galleries in chronological order.

moma has a fabulous collection of all kinds of art beginning in the impressionist period and continuing to the present day. wendy and i were in the minority. i reckon about three quarters of the many visitors were foreigners. it's a world class museum. here's a shot of andrew wyeth's famous painting christina's world.

a police officer at thecentral park boathouse boat rental dockwhere a 16 year old victim was robbed of his smartphone and the concession stand's tip jar. the young victim was manning the food stand at the loeb boathouse when thieves one them wielding a knife emptied his pockets. read more two crooks rob teenager 16 running boathouse concession stand in central park new york daily news september 4 2013 by mark morales
central park boat rental concessionaire robbed at knife point

the young victim was manning the food stand at the loeb boathouse when thieves one them wielding a knife emptied his pockets. police released the surveillance video hoping someone will be able to identify one of the suspects. the 16 year old victim was working the food stand at the loeb boathouse on east 73nd st. when he was approached by the duo about 6 p. m. tuesday cops said.

jointly produced by cj entertainment amp media and sm entertainment i am. follows members of sm entertainment's idol groups during the historic smtown live world tour as they prepare for their historic october 23 2011 concert at new yorks legendary madison square garden. movie cast super junior girls' generation shinee tvxq boa kwon chil hyun ahn soon kyu lee im yoon a yuri kwon movie crew movie i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden revised romanization i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden hangul i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden director choi jin sung release date may 10 2012 language korean country south korea

i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden south korea movie peivews amp reviews synopsis cj e amp m and sm entertainment collaborate to make the film i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden. the film will chronicle the musical artists from sm entertainment and through footage show their years of training daily lives and frank confessions from the artists. the dreams of the artists will also be shown.

jointly produced by cj entertainment amp media and sm entertainment i am. follows members of sm entertainment's idol groups during the historic smtown live world tour as they prepare for their historic october 23 2011 concert at new yorks legendary madison square garden. this is not the first time that k pop stars graced the hallowed gahh den renowned world idol star rain mounted his famous rainy day new york shows there in 2006 attracting attention from media outlets as time magazine.

i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden south korea movie peivews amp reviews synopsis cj e amp m and sm entertainment collaborate to make the film i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden. the film will chronicle the musical artists from sm entertainment and through footage show their years of training daily lives and frank confessions from the artists. the dreams of the artists will also be shown.

chronicles the passion of sm entertainment's artists in leading the newest k pop hype and delves into the preparation that goes into honing the impeccably choreographed performances or stages of each group. i am will cover footage of the day and events surrounding smtown live world tour in madison square garden back in october of 2011 as well as other exclusive content. movie cast super junior girls' generation shinee tvxq boa kwon chil hyun ahn soon kyu lee im yoon a yuri kwon movie crew movie i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden revised romanization i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden hangul i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden director choi jin sung release date may 10 2012 language korean country south korea

i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden south korea movie peivews amp reviews synopsis cj e amp m and sm entertainment collaborate to make the film i am smtown live world tour in madison square garden. the film will chronicle the musical artists from sm entertainment and through footage show their years of training daily lives and frank confessions from the artists. the dreams of the artists will also be shown.
